Nam sygesbrycht his wyce,

Ship ever upon the sea , Odysseus' ship :

O crafty Odysseus

, From whom our embraces ?

div.p: I have had three letters from Mr Rutter relating to a " lost " manuscript , the last of which is an impertinence.]]
